title: Alisha-k
author: Alisha-k
created_time: May 16, 2023, 07:26:59 AMLast edit: May 30, 2023, 06:28:01 AM by Alisha-k
content: Something happened in my locality and I just wonder if that's how we also behave in the online space.So, they're always a group of rougues in my country, they're often sited in the market place where there's a reasonable population, what's their work???The have things in a martch box like stones and sticks, they'll ask you to pick the one out of it that has something, depending on what the want....At first, when you pick, they'll let you win so as to drag your attention, then subsequent tries, you'll be at the losing side and the make sure the drain your pockets entirely.So, just last week, this lady fell a victim and she was shouting and crying, the had obviously emptied her pocket and even gotten her phone from her in the process of the gambling.My thoughts, is this how we often feel when we lose out on a bet??Do you wish the site can refund your money??Gambling should be your choice, you shouldn't let anyone compel or persuade you into it.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: this is clearly reminiscent of the "shell game". but it has nothing to do with "a site". I don't understand this question "Do you wish the site can refund your money??"why do you say that a "site" should make a refund?these dishonest gambling activities exist in any country (with variations) and it is a scam no more.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shell_gamethe game is rigged. even if you win they just run away with the money or worse they might beat you up.it really doesn't make sense to participate in such an activity, it's a bit like turning to a ponzi scheme hoping to become rich.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Losing a bet and feeling bad about it is normal; no one is always happy to lose money, either in gambling or in anything else. But we always rejoice when we win a bet from an online casino or even in a betting shop, forgetting that most of the money we win is also part of other losses.This is the main reason why people should always have a stop limit, know when to stop when they are gambling, have a target when they exhaust the money they planned to use, and learn to call it a day. Continuously betting without checking their balance at hand always results in things like this. This is the point where we call someone a gambling addict.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 07:26:59 AMMy thoughts, is this how we often feel when we lose out on a bet??You need to know that every gambler has different goals when playing games or betting.If we gamble just for fun and get more insight or experience then lose will never feel like what you tell in the sentence above.Gambling is a self-made choice and every gambler must know the risks of gambling before actually risking something, so whatever happens, be it a big loss, a gambler must be able to accept it because it is a risk of what he is doing choose.QuoteDo you wish the site can refund your money??It seems that gambling sites will never return money to gamblers who have lost because gambling sites are made to do business and get some profit.Expecting money back after losing will only be in vain. It's better to stop and learn from the defeat, then go back to betting for the luck, which may come with a win.

comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 07:26:59 AMSomething happened in my locality and I just wonder if that's how we also behave in the online space.So, they're always a group of rougues in my country, they're often sited in the market place where there's a reasonable population, what's their work???The have things in a martch box like stones and sticks, they'll ask you to pick the one out of it that has something, depending on what the want....At first, when you pick, they'll let you win so as to drag your attention, then subsequent wins, you'll be at the losing side and the make sure the drain your pockets entirely.So, just last week, this lady fell a victim and she was shouting and crying, the had obviously emptied her pocket and even gotten her phone from her in the process of the gambling.My thoughts, is this how we often feel when we lose out on a bet??Do you wish the site can refund your money??Gambling should be your choice, you shouldn't let anyone compel or persuade you into it.These type of cheaters were so popular where I live now as I have been told by the locals in 1992-1997 as they had some cups in which they filled a dice in there and they told you if you find where the dice is you will win x amount of money.People at first fell completely for this trick and they lost a lot of money until the government ban them completely in 1997 which saw a relief.Where I am originally from this was never allowed because government was very strict about street gambling as that is what this is.In the end luckily nowadays no one falls for this as we have online gambling which we can play in the comfort of our home without anyone impacting our decision and this online gambling will continue to boom further exactly from this benefit.

comments.body: Quote from: aioc on May 16, 2023, 09:34:20 AMQuote from: Alisha-k on May 16, 2023, 07:26:59 AMMy thoughts, is this how we often feel when we lose out on a bet??Do you wish the site can refund your money??No casino will refund your money under any circumstances when you bet and you lose, you lose, it's your choice that you bet and lose your money your being irresponsible causes you to lose your money a casino will just offer you to play QuoteGambling should be your choice, you shouldn't let anyone compel or persuade you into it.You should be responsible enough to think for yourself, even if you are persuaded or asked to play whatever outcome you should accept, what if you hit the jackpot and won a lot of money you will be thankful that they persuade or asked you to play.It's just ridiculous to think that after a loss, some casino can return the lost money to you.   Such naivety can only be characteristic of naive young ladies who still think that the casino will show unheard of nobility and give back, for example, the money accidentally lost by this funny young lady.  But it never occurs to any normal gambler to beg for a refund of lost money.  The most correct thing is to simply inspire yourself, and even constantly think that lost money is a payment for the pleasure of playing and feeling all the emotions associated with gambling.  I know for myself that sometimes even after losing a little, I understand that the feelings and emotions that I got during the game are generally even more expensive than the money that I lost.  But this is according to my own views it is so!  Well, if you are lucky and you won, then there is no talk about the fact that in this case there are only pluses for you both in money and in emotions.
